comment: /**  * Handle a failed {@link ActionRequest}.  *  * @param action the {@link ActionRequest} that failed due to the failure  * @param failure the cause of failure  * @param restStatusCode the REST status code of the failure (-1 if none can be retrieved)  * @param indexer request indexer to re-add the failed action, if intended to do so  *  * @throws Throwable if the sink should fail on this failure, the implementation should rethrow  *                   the exception or a custom one  */
code: /**  * Handle a failed {@link ActionRequest}.  *  * @param action the {@link ActionRequest} that failed due to the failure  * @param failure the cause of failure  * @param restStatusCode the REST status code of the failure (-1 if none can be retrieved)  * @param indexer request indexer to re-add the failed action, if intended to do so  *  * @throws Throwable if the sink should fail on this failure, the implementation should rethrow  *                   the exception or a custom one  */ void onFailure(ActionRequest action, Throwable failure, int restStatusCode, RequestIndexer indexer) throws Throwable.
